trans-unit.source: Provides User Datagram Protocol (UDP) network services.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder protokollen UDP (User Datagram) nettverk.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> and allows the underlying service provider to assign the most appropriate local IPv4 address and port number.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren oppretter en ny <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>og gjør den underliggende leverandøren for å tilordne mest aktuelle lokale IPv4-adresse og port nummer.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: If this constructor is used, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> instance is set with an address family of IPv4 that cannot be changed or overwritten by a connect method call with an IPv6 target.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne konstruktøren brukes, den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>forekomsten med som er angitt en adresseserien med IPv4 som ikke kan endres eller overskrevet av et koble metodekall med et IPv6-mål.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du får en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, Bruk <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ikke hente feilkoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Når du har fått denne koden, kan du se Windows Sockets versjon 2 API feil code-dokumentasjonen i MSDN for en detaljert beskrivelse av feilen.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not suitable for joining a multicast group because it does not perform socket binding.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren, kan ikke brukes for å bli med i en multikastings gruppe fordi den ikke utfører socket-binding.

trans-unit.source: Also, it works only with IPv4 address types.
trans-unit.target: Også fungerer den bare med IPv4-adressetyper.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under tilgang til socket.

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se kommentarer for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"></xref> class and binds it to the local port number provided.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"> </xref> klasse og bindes til det lokale portnummeret som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> and binds it to the port number from which you intend to communicate.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren oppretter en underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>og bindes til portnummeret du skal kommunisere.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor if you are only interested in setting the local port number.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren Hvis du bare er interessert i innstillingen lokale portnummeret.

trans-unit.source: The underlying service provider will assign the local IP address.
trans-unit.target: Leverandøren av underliggende tilordne den lokale IP-adressen.

trans-unit.source: If you pass 0 to the constructor, the underlying service provider will assign a port number.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du sender 0 til konstruktøren, tilordne underliggende tjenesteleverandøren et portnummer.

trans-unit.source: If this constructor is used, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> instance is set with an address family of IPv4 that cannot be changed or overwritten by a connect method call with an IPv6 target.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne konstruktøren brukes, den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>forekomsten med som er angitt en adresseserien med IPv4 som ikke kan endres eller overskrevet av et koble metodekall med et IPv6-mål.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du får en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, Bruk <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ikke hente feilkoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Når du har fått denne koden, kan du se Windows Sockets versjon 2 API feil code-dokumentasjonen i MSDN for en detaljert beskrivelse av feilen.

trans-unit.source: This constructor works only with IPv4 address types.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren fungerer bare med IPv4-adressetyper.

trans-unit.source: The local port number from which you intend to communicate.
trans-unit.target: Lokale portnummeret du skal kommunisere.

trans-unit.source: The port parameter is greater than or less than .
trans-unit.target: Den port parameteren er større enn eller mindre enn .

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under tilgang til socket.

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se kommentarer for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"></xref> class and binds it to the specified local endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"> </xref> klasse og bindes til det angitte lokale sluttpunktet.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> and binds it to the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> specified by the `localEP` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren oppretter en ny <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>og binder den til den <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>angitt av den `localEP` parameteren.</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: Before you call this constructor, you must create an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> using the IP address and port number from which you intend to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: Før du kaller opp denne konstruktøren, må du opprette en <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>ved hjelp av IP-adresse og port. hvor du vil sende og motta data.</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to specify a local IP address and port number for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke angi en lokal IP-adressen og portnummeret for sending og mottak av data.

trans-unit.source: If you do not, the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate local IP address and port number.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke gjør dette, tilordne underliggende tjenesteleverandøren mest aktuelle lokale IP-adresse og port. tallet.

trans-unit.source: If this constructor is used, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> instance is set with the address family specified by the `localEP` parameter that cannot be changed or overwritten by a connect method call with a different address family.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne konstruktøren brukes, den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>forekomsten er angitt med adresse familien angitt av den `localEP` parameter som ikke endres eller overskrevet av et koble metodekall med en annen adresse serie.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du får en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, Bruk <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ikke hente feilkoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Når du har fått denne koden, kan du se Windows Sockets versjon 2 API feil code-dokumentasjonen i MSDN for en detaljert beskrivelse av feilen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> that respresents the local endpoint to which you bind the UDP connection.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>som respresents det lokale sluttpunktet som du binder UDP-tilkobling.</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: The `family` parameter determines whether the listener uses an IP version 4 address (IPv4) or an IP version 6 (IPv6) address.
trans-unit.target: Den `family` parameteren bestemmer om lytteobjektet bruker en IP-versjon 4-adresse (IPv4) eller versjon 6 (IPv6) en IP-adresse.

trans-unit.source: To use an IPv4 address, pass the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily> value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke en IPv4-adresse, sendes det <xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily>verdi.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily>

trans-unit.source: To use an IPv6 address, pass the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily> value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke en IPv6-adresse, sendes det <xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily>verdi.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily>

trans-unit.source: Passing any other value will cause the method to throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: Sending av en annen verdi vil føre til at metoden skal returneres <xref:System.ArgumentException>.</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: If this constructor is used, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> instance is set with the address family specified by the `family` parameter that cannot be changed or overwritten by a connect method call with a different address family.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne konstruktøren brukes, den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>forekomsten er angitt med adresse familien angitt av den `family` parameter som ikke endres eller overskrevet av et koble metodekall med en annen adresse serie.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"></xref> class and establishes a default remote host.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"> </xref> klasse og oppretter en standard ekstern vert.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a new <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> and establishes a remote host using the `hostname` and `port` parameters.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer en ny <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>og oppretter en ekstern vert ved hjelp av den `hostname` og `port` parametere.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: Establishing a default remote host is optional.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en standard ekstern vert er valgfrie.

trans-unit.source: If you use this constructor, you do not have to specify a remote host in each call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker denne konstruktøren, har du ikke angir en ekstern vert i hvert kall til den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifying a default remote host limits you to that host only.
trans-unit.target: Angir standard ekstern vert er begrenset til bare som er vert for.

trans-unit.source: You can change the default remote host at any time by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre den eksterne Standardverten når som helst ved å kalle den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify a remote host in your call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method, do not use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en ekstern vert i kallet til den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>metoden, bruker ikke denne konstruktøren.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du får en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, Bruk <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ikke hente feilkoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.target: Når du har fått denne koden, kan du se Windows Sockets versjon 2 API feil code-dokumentasjonen i MSDN for en detaljert beskrivelse av feilen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the remote DNS host to which you intend to connect.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den eksterne DNS-verten som du har tenkt å koble til.

trans-unit.source: The remote port number to which you intend to connect.
trans-unit.target: Eksterne portnummeret du vil koble til.

trans-unit.source: hostname is .
trans-unit.target: hostnameis .

trans-unit.source: port is not between and .
trans-unit.target: porter ikke mellom og .

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under tilgang til socket.

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se kommentarer for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a default remote host has been established.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om det er opprettet en standard ekstern vert.

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> can use this property to determine if a default remote host has been established.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som er avledet fra <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>kan bruke denne egenskapen til å fastsette om det er opprettet en standard ekstern vert.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: You can establish a default remote host by using the appropriate constructor or by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette en ekstern standardvert ved å bruke riktig konstruktør eller ved å kalle den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do establish a default remote host, you cannot specify a remote host in your call to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du opprette en ekstern standardvert, kan du angi en ekstern vert i kallet til <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a connection is active; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en tilkobling er aktiv. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables Network Address Translation (NAT) traversal on a <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer eller deaktiverer {traversering oversettelsen (Network Address Translation) på en <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The AllowNatTraversal method is used to enable or disable NAT traversal for a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> instance.
trans-unit.target: Metoden AllowNatTraversal brukes til å aktivere eller deaktivere NAT-gjennomgang for en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>forekomsten.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: NAT traversal may be provided using Teredo, 6to4, or an ISATAP tunnel.
trans-unit.target: {Traversering NAT kan angis ved hjelp av Teredo, 6to4 eller en ISATAP-tunnel.

trans-unit.source: When the `allowed` parameter is false, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName> option on the associated socket is set to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPProtectionLevel>.
trans-unit.target: Når den `allowed` parameteren er USANN, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName>alternativet tilknyttede socket er satt til <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPProtectionLevel>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPProtectionLevel> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName>

trans-unit.source: This explicitly disables NAT traversal for a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> instance.
trans-unit.target: Dette deaktiverer eksplisitt NAT-gjennomgang for en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>forekomsten.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: When the `allowed` parameter is true, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName> option on the associated socket is set to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPProtectionLevel>.
trans-unit.target: Når den `allowed` parameteren er SANN, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName>alternativet tilknyttede socket er satt til <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPProtectionLevel>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPProtectionLevel> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName>

trans-unit.source: This may allow NAT traversal for a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> depending on firewall rules in place on the system.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan gjøre at traversering NAT for en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>avhengig av brannmurreglene på plass på systemet.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: A Teredo address is an IPv6 address with the prefix of 2001::/32.
trans-unit.target: En Teredo-adresse er en IPv6-adresse med prefikset for 2001:: / 32.

trans-unit.source: Teredo addresses can be returned through normal DNS name resolution or enumerated as an IPv6 address assigned to a local interface.
trans-unit.target: Teredo-adresser kan returneres via normal DNS-navneoppløsning eller listes opp som et IPv6-adresse som tilordnes til et lokalt grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that specifies whether to enable or disable NAT traversal.
trans-unit.target: En boolsk verdi som angir om å aktivere eller deaktivere NAT-gjennomgang.

trans-unit.source: Gets the amount of data received from the network that is available to read.
trans-unit.target: Henter mengden data som er mottatt fra nettverket som er klart til å lese.

trans-unit.source: The Available property is used to determine the amount of data queued in the network buffer for reading.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen tilgjengelig brukes til å finne ut hvor mye data i kø i nettverket bufferen for lesing.

trans-unit.source: If data is available, call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A> to get the data.
trans-unit.target: Hvis data er tilgjengelig, kaller <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>å hente data.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no data is available, the Available property returns 0.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen data er tilgjengelig, returnerer den tilgjengelige egenskapen 0.

trans-unit.source: If the remote host shuts down or closes the connection, the Available property throws a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den eksterne verten avsluttes eller lukker tilkoblingen, oppstår tilgjengelig egenskapen <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to obtain the specific error code and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)/ for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du får en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, Bruk <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>laster du ned feilkoden og i Windows Sockets versjon 2 API feil kode dokumentasjonen på MSDN-biblioteket på [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)/ for en detaljert beskrivelse av feilen.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes of data received from the network.
trans-unit.target: Antall byte mottatt fra nettverket.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while attempting to access the socket.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `requestCallback` delegate.

trans-unit.source: This method does not block until the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden blokkerer ikke før operasjonen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation is complete, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying network <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir det underliggende nettverket <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> creates a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> used to send and receive data over a network.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>oppretter en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>brukes til å sende og motta data via et nettverk.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket></xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> can use this property to get or set this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som er avledet fra <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>kan bruke denne egenskapen for å hente eller angi <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: Use the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> returned from Client if you require access beyond that which <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> provides.
trans-unit.target: Bruk den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>returnert fra klienten Hvis du trenger tilgang enn det som <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>gir.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: You can also use Client to set the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> to an existing <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke klienten til den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>til en eksisterende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you want to take advantage of the simplicity of <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> using a pre-existing <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig hvis du vil dra nytte av enkelt med <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>en eksisterende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: The underlying Network <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Det underliggende nettverket <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Closes the UDP connection.
trans-unit.target: Lukker UDP-tilkobling.

trans-unit.source: The Close disables the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> and releases all managed and unmanaged resources associated with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>.
trans-unit.target: Avsluttende deaktiverer underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>og frigir alle behandlet ressurser som er knyttet til <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du får en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, Bruk <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ikke hente feilkoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Når du har fått denne koden, kan du se Windows Sockets versjon 2 API feil code-dokumentasjonen i MSDN for en detaljert beskrivelse av feilen.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under tilgang til socket.

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se kommentarer for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Establishes a default remote host using the specified network endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ekstern vert ved hjelp av angitt nettverkssted endepunktet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method establishes a default remote host using the value specified in the `endPoint` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>metoden oppretter en ekstern vert med verdien som er angitt i den `endPoint` parameteren.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once established, you do not have to specify a remote host in each call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Når du opprettet, du har ikke til å angi en ekstern vert i hvert kall til den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: Establishing a default remote host is optional.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en standard ekstern vert er valgfrie.

trans-unit.source: Specifying a default remote host limits you to that host only.
trans-unit.target: Angir standard ekstern vert er begrenset til bare som er vert for.

trans-unit.source: If you want to send datagrams to a different remote host, you must make another call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method or create another <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> without a default remote host.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil sende datagram til en annen ekstern vert, må du gjøre et annet kall til den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>metode, eller Opprett en ny <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>uten en standard ekstern vert.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you have established a default remote host and you also provide a remote host in your call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har opprettet en standard eksterne angi verten, og du også en ekstern vert i samtalen til <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>metoden, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>vil throw <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du får en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, Bruk <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ikke hente feilkoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Når du har fått denne koden, kan du se Windows Sockets versjon 2 API feil code-dokumentasjonen i MSDN for en detaljert beskrivelse av feilen.

trans-unit.source: If you call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> method, any datagrams that arrive from an address other than the specified default will be discarded.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kaller den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>metoden, datagram som kommer fra en adresse enn den angitte standarden, forkastes.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot set the default remote host to a broadcast address using this method unless you inherit from <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>, use the Client method to obtain the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, and set the socket option to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke angi standard ekstern vert til en kringkasting adresse med denne metoden hvis du arve fra <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>, Bruk metoden klienten til å hente den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, og angi alternativet socket <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: You can however, broadcast data to the default broadcast address, 255.255.255.255, if you specify <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Broadcast?displayProperty=fullName> in your call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan imidlertid, kringkasting data til standard kringkasting adresse, 255.255.255.255, hvis du angir <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Broadcast?displayProperty=fullName>i kallet til den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> </xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Broadcast?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If your application requires greater control over broadcast addresses, you can also revert to using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet krever større kontroll over kringkasting adresser, kan du kan også gå til ved hjelp av <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>klasse.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Since the UDP protocol is connectionless, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method does not block.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Fordi det UDP-protokollen er forbindelsesløs, den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>metoden ikke blokker.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do not call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method if you intend to receive multicasted datagrams.
trans-unit.target: Ikke kall den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>metoden hvis du ønsker å motta multicasted datagram.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> that specifies the network endpoint to which you intend to send data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>som angir nettverksendepunktet som du har tenkt å sende data.</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under tilgang til socket.

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se kommentarer for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: endPoint is .
trans-unit.target: endPointis .

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"></xref> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"> </xref> er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Establishes a default remote host using the specified IP address and port number.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ekstern vert med det angitte IP-adresse og port. tallet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method establishes a default remote host using the values specified in the `addr` and `port` parameters.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>metoden oppretter en ekstern vert ved hjelp av verdiene som er angitt i den `addr` og `port` parametere.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once established, you do not have to specify a remote host in each call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Når du opprettet, du har ikke til å angi en ekstern vert i hvert kall til den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: Establishing a default remote host is optional.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en standard ekstern vert er valgfrie.

trans-unit.source: Specifying a default remote host limits you to that host only.
trans-unit.target: Angir standard ekstern vert er begrenset til bare som er vert for.

trans-unit.source: If you want to send datagrams to a different remote host, you must make another call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method or create another <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> without a default remote host.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil sende datagram til en annen ekstern vert, må du gjøre et annet kall til den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>metode, eller Opprett en ny <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>uten en standard ekstern vert.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you have established a default remote host and you also provide a remote host in your call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har opprettet en standard eksterne angi verten, og du også en ekstern vert i samtalen til <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>metoden, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>vil throw <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du får en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, Bruk <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ikke hente feilkoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Når du har fått denne koden, kan du se Windows Sockets versjon 2 API feil code-dokumentasjonen i MSDN for en detaljert beskrivelse av feilen.

trans-unit.source: If you call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A> method, any datagrams that arrive from an address other than the specified default will be discarded.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kaller den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>metoden, datagram som kommer fra en adresse enn den angitte standarden, forkastes.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot set the default remote host to a broadcast address using this method unless you inherit from <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>, use the client method to obtain the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, and set the socket option to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke angi standard ekstern vert til en kringkasting adresse med denne metoden hvis du arve fra <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>, Bruk metoden klienten til å hente den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, og angi alternativet socket <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: You can however, broadcast data to the default broadcast address, 255.255.255.255, if you specify <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Broadcast?displayProperty=fullName> in your call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan imidlertid, kringkasting data til standard kringkasting adresse, 255.255.255.255, hvis du angir <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Broadcast?displayProperty=fullName>i kallet til den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> </xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Broadcast?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If your application requires greater control over broadcast addresses, you can also revert to using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet krever større kontroll over kringkasting adresser, kan du kan også gå til ved hjelp av <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>klasse.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Since the UDP protocol is connectionless, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method does not block.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Fordi det UDP-protokollen er forbindelsesløs, den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>metoden ikke blokker.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do not call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method if you intend to receive multicasted datagrams.
trans-unit.target: Ikke kall den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>metoden hvis du ønsker å motta multicasted datagram.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: Releases the managed and unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir behandlet ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose()`metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` -parameteren er SANN, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>referanser.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"></xref> allows Internet Protocol (IP) datagrams to be fragmented.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"> </xref> tillater IP (Internet Protocol) datagram være fragmentert.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Datagrams require fragmentation when their size exceeds the Maximum Transfer Unit (MTU) of the transmission medium.
trans-unit.target: Datagram krever fragmentert når størrelse overskrider den maksimale overføre MTU (Unit) overføring middels.

trans-unit.source: Datagrams may be fragmented by the sending host or by an intermediate router.
trans-unit.target: Datagram kan være fragmentert av verten som sender eller av en mellomliggende ruter.

trans-unit.source: If a datagram must be fragmented, and the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.DontFragment%2A> option is set, the datagram is discarded, and an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) error message is sent back to the sender of the datagram.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en datagram må være fragmentert, og <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.DontFragment%2A>alternativet er angitt i datagram forkastes og feilmeldingen Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) sendes tilbake til avsenderen av datagrammet.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.DontFragment%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"></xref> allows datagram fragmentation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"> </xref> tillater datagram fragmentert; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property can be set only for sockets that use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily> flag or the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily> flag.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan bare angis for socketer som bruker den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily>flagget eller <xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily>flagg.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily>

trans-unit.source: Leaves a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: Forlater en multikastings gruppe.

trans-unit.source: The DropMulticastGroup method withdraws the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> from the multicast group identified by the specified <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden DropMulticastGroup trekker <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>fra gruppen multikastingsbyte identifisert av den angitte <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: After calling the DropMulticastGroup method, the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> sends an Internet Group Management Protocol (IGMP) packet to the router, removing the router from the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: Etter å metoden DropMulticastGroup den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>sender en pakke for Internet Group Management Protocol (IGMP) til ruter, fjerner ruteren fra gruppen multikastingsbyte.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: After a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> withdraws from the group, it will no longer be able to receive datagrams sent to that group.
trans-unit.target: Etter en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>trekker fra gruppen, vil den ikke lenger kunne motta sendte til denne gruppen.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: Broadcasting is limited to a specific subnet.
trans-unit.target: Kringkasting er begrenset til et bestemt delnett.

trans-unit.source: You can broadcast to your local subnet by sending a packet to 255.255.255.255; or, you can use the directed broadcast address, which is the network portion of an Internet Protocol (IP) address with all bits set in the host portion.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kringkasting til din lokale delnettet ved å sende en pakke 255.255.255.255; eller du kan bruke styrt kringkasting adressen som nettverksdelen av et Internet Protocol IP-adresse med alle bitsettet i vertsdelen.

trans-unit.source: For example, if your IP address is 192.168.1.40 (a Class C address, with the network portion as the first three octets, and the host portion is the last octet), your directed broadcast address is 192.168.1.255.
trans-unit.target: Hvis IP-adressen er 192.168.1.40 (en klasse C-adresse med nettverk-del som de første tre oktettene og vertsdelen er den siste oktetten), er kontrollert kringkasting adressen 192.168.1.255 samsvare med.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"></xref> allows broadcast packets; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"> </xref> tillater kringkasting pakker; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"></xref> allows only one client to use a port.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"> </xref> tillater bare én klienten til å bruke en port.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: By default, multiple clients can use a specific port; however, only one of the clients can perform operations on the network traffic sent to the port.
trans-unit.target: Som standard kan flere klienter bruke en bestemt port; bare én av klienter kan imidlertid utføre operasjoner på nettverkstrafikk som er sendt til porten.

trans-unit.source: You can use the ExclusiveAddressUse property to prevent multiple clients from using a specific port.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke egenskapen ExclusiveAddressUse for å hindre at flere klienter ved hjelp av en bestemt port.

trans-unit.source: This property must be set before the underlying socket is bound to a client port.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen må angis før den underliggende socketen er bundet til en Klientport.

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Int32%29?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily%29?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Net.IPEndPoint%29?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=fullName>, the client port is bound as a side effect of the constructor, and you cannot subsequently set the ExclusiveAddressUse property
trans-unit.target: Hvis du kaller <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Int32%29?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily%29?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Net.IPEndPoint%29?displayProperty=fullName>, eller <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=fullName>klientporten er bundet som en side effekten av konstruktøren, og du kan ikke angi egenskapen ExclusiveAddressUse senere</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Net.IPEndPoint%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Int32%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"></xref> allows only one client to use a specific port; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"> </xref> tillater bare én klienten til å bruke en bestemt port; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP Service Pack 2 and later, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for all other versions.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> for Windows Server 2003 og Windows XP Service Pack 2 eller senere, og <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> for alle andre versjoner.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the underlying socket.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under forsøk på å få tilgang til den underliggende socketen.

trans-unit.source: The underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: Den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>har blitt lukket.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"></xref> to a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"> </xref> til en multikastings gruppe.

trans-unit.source: The JoinMulticastGroup method subscribes the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> to a multicast group using the specified <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden JoinMulticastGroup abonnerer <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>til en multikastings gruppe ved hjelp av den angitte <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: After calling the JoinMulticastGroup method, the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> sends an Internet Group Management Protocol (IGMP) packet to the router requesting membership to the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: Etter å metoden JoinMulticastGroup den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>sender en pakke for Internet Group Management Protocol (IGMP) til ruter ber om medlemskap i gruppen multikastingsbyte.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: The multicast address range is 224.0.0.0 to 239.255.255.255.
trans-unit.target: Multikastadresse er mellom 224.0.0.0 til 239.255.255.255.

trans-unit.source: If you specify an address outside this range or if the router to which the request is made is not multicast enabled, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir en adresse utenfor dette området ikke eller ruter som forespørselen sendes multikastingsbyte aktivert, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>vil throw <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du får en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, Bruk <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ikke hente feilkoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Når du har fått denne koden, kan du se Windows Sockets versjon 2 API feil code-dokumentasjonen i MSDN for en detaljert beskrivelse av feilen.

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> is listed with the router as a member of the multicast group, it will be able to receive multicasted datagrams sent to the specified <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>.
trans-unit.target: Én gang i <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>er oppført med ruter som medlem av gruppen multikastingsbyte, vil den ikke kunne få multicasted datagram som er sendt til den angitte <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must create the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> using the multicast port number; otherwise, you will not be able to receive multicasted datagrams.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Må du opprette den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>ved hjelp av multikastingsbyte portnummeret; ellers du vil ikke kunne få multicasted datagram.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: Do not call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method prior to calling the JoinMulticastGroup method, or the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A> method will not work.
trans-unit.target: Ikke kall den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>metoden før du kaller metoden JoinMulticastGroup eller <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A>metoden vil ikke fungere.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Receive%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to belong to a multicast group to send datagrams to a multicast IP address.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke hører til en multikastings gruppe sende datagram til en multikastings-IP-adresse.

trans-unit.source: Before joining a multicast group, make sure the socket is bound to the port or endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Før du legger til en multikastings gruppe, kontroller at socketen er bundet til port eller sluttpunktet.

trans-unit.source: You do that by calling one of the constructors that accept a port or an endpoint as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Du kan gjøre dette ved å kalle én av konstruktører som godtar en port eller et endepunkt som en parameter.

trans-unit.source: To stop receiving multicasted datagrams, call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.DropMulticastGroup%2A> method and provide the <xref:System.Net.IPAddress> of the group from which you would like to withdraw.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil slutte å motta multicasted datagram ved kall av <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.DropMulticastGroup%2A>metoden og gir den <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>for gruppen du vil trekke tilbake som.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.DropMulticastGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In the IPv6 case, there are several multicast address ranges you can choose from.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I IPv6 fall finner flere multikastadresse områder som du kan velge blant.

trans-unit.source: Please, refer to the IETF RFC 2375.
trans-unit.target: Se IETF RFC 2375.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You cannot call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A> on a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> constructed without a specific local port (that is, using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily%29> constructor).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan ikke kalle <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A>på en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>konstruert uten en bestemt lokale port (det vil si ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor>eller <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily%29>konstruktøren).</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily%29> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: The multicast <xref:System.Net.IPAddress> of the group you want to join.
trans-unit.target: Multikast <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>for gruppen du vil delta.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress>

trans-unit.source: The underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: Den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>har blitt lukket.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under tilgang til socket.

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se kommentarer for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: The IP address is not compatible with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily> value that defines the addressing scheme of the socket.
trans-unit.target: IP-adressen er ikke kompatibel med den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily>verdi som definerer adresseringsskjemaet for socket.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"></xref> to a multicast group.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"> </xref> til en multikastings gruppe.

trans-unit.source: Before joining a multicast group, be sure the socket is bound to the port or endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Før du legger til en multikastings gruppe, pass på socketen er bundet til port eller sluttpunktet.

trans-unit.source: You can do this by calling one of the constructors that accepts a port or an endpoint as parameter.
trans-unit.target: Du kan gjøre dette ved å kalle én av konstruktører som godtar en port og et endepunkt som parameter.

trans-unit.source: The `infindex` parameter is used to identify a hardware interface on the same link.
trans-unit.target: Den `infindex` parameteren brukes til å identifisere en maskinvare-grensesnittet på den samme koblingen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > There are several multicast address ranges to choose from.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Det er flere multikastadresse områder du kan velge blant.

trans-unit.source: Refer to the IETF RFC 2375.
trans-unit.target: Se IETF RFC 2375.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You cannot call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A> on a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> constructed without a specific local port (that is, using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan ikke kalle <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A>på en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>konstruert uten en bestemt lokale port (det vil si ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily%29?displayProperty=fullName>konstruktøren).</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: The interface index associated with the local IP address on which to join the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: Grensesnittindeksen som er knyttet til den lokale IP-adressen som skal bli med i multikastingsbyte gruppen.

trans-unit.source: The multicast <xref:System.Net.IPAddress> of the group you want to join.
trans-unit.target: Multikast <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>for gruppen du vil delta.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress>

trans-unit.source: The underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: Den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>har blitt lukket.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under tilgang til socket.

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se kommentarer for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"></xref> to a multicast group with the specified Time to Live (TTL).
trans-unit.target: Legger til en <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"> </xref> til en multikastings gruppe med den angitte tiden til Live (TTL).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A> method subscribes the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> to a multicast group using the specified <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>.

trans-unit.source: After calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A> method, the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> sends an Internet Group Management Protocol (IGMP) packet to the router requesting membership to the multicast group.
trans-unit.target: Etter kall av <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A>metode, og den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>sender en pakke for Internet Group Management Protocol (IGMP) til ruter ber om medlemskap i gruppen multikastingsbyte.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: The multicast address range is 224.0.0.0 to 239.255.255.255.
trans-unit.target: Multikastadresse er mellom 224.0.0.0 til 239.255.255.255.

trans-unit.source: If you specify an address outside this range or if the router to which the request is made is not multicast enabled, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir en adresse utenfor dette området ikke eller ruter som forespørselen sendes multikastingsbyte aktivert, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>vil throw <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to obtain the specific error code.

trans-unit.target: Når du har fått denne koden, kan du se Windows Sockets versjon 2 API feil code-dokumentasjonen i MSDN for en detaljert beskrivelse av feilen.

trans-unit.source: The `timeToLive` parameter specifies how many router hops will be allowed for a multicasted datagram before being discarded.
trans-unit.target: Den `timeToLive` parameteren angir hvor mange ruter mellomstasjoner tillates for en multicasted datagram før den forkastes.

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> is listed with the router as a member of the multicast group, it will be able to receive multicasted datagrams sent to the specified <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>.
trans-unit.target: Én gang i <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>er oppført med ruter som medlem av gruppen multikastingsbyte, vil den ikke kunne få multicasted datagram som er sendt til den angitte <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must create the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> using the multicast port number otherwise you will not be able to receive multicasted datagrams.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Må du opprette den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>ved hjelp av multikastingsbyte portnummeret Hvis du vil ikke kunne motta multicasted datagram.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>

trans-unit.source: Do not call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method prior to calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A> method or the receive method will not work.
trans-unit.target: Ikke kall den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>metoden før du kaller den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A>metoden eller receive-metoden vil ikke fungere.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to belong to a multicast group to send datagrams to a multicast IP address.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke hører til en multikastings gruppe sende datagram til en multikastings-IP-adresse.

trans-unit.source: Before joining a multicast group make sure the socket is bound to the port or endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller at socketen er bundet til port eller endpoint før du legger til en multikastings gruppe.

trans-unit.source: You do that by calling one of the constructors that accept as parameter a port or an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Du kan gjøre dette ved å kalle én av konstruktører som godtar som parameter, en port eller et endepunkt.

trans-unit.source: To stop receiving multicasted datagrams, call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.DropMulticastGroup%2A> method and provide the <xref:System.Net.IPAddress> of the group from which you would like to withdraw.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil slutte å motta multicasted datagram ved kall av <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.DropMulticastGroup%2A>metoden og gir den <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>for gruppen du vil trekke tilbake som.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.DropMulticastGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You cannot call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A> on a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> constructed without a specific local port (that is, using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily%29> constructor).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du kan ikke kalle <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A>på en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient>konstruert uten en bestemt lokale port (det vil si ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor>eller <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily%29>konstruktøren).</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor%28System.Net.Sockets.AddressFamily%29> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.%23ctor> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.JoinMulticastGroup%2A>

trans-unit.target: Legger til en <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"> </xref> til en multikastings gruppe.

trans-unit.source: Before you join a multicast group, be sure that the socket is bound to the port or endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Før du koble til en multikastings gruppe, må du kontrollere at socketen er bundet til port eller sluttpunktet.

trans-unit.source: You can do this by calling one of the constructors that accepts a port or an endpoint as parameter.
trans-unit.target: Du kan gjøre dette ved å kalle én av konstruktører som godtar en port og et endepunkt som parameter.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > There are several multicast address ranges to choose from.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Det er flere multikastadresse områder du kan velge blant.

trans-unit.source: You can find them in the IETF RFC 2375.
trans-unit.target: Du finner dem i IETF RFC 2375.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that specifies whether outgoing multicast packets are delivered to the sending application.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som angir om utgående multikastingsbyte pakker leveres til avsenderprogrammet.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Multicast is a scalable method for many-to-many communication on the Internet.
trans-unit.target: Multikast er en skalerbar metode for mange-til-mange-kommunikasjon på Internett.

trans-unit.source: If a process subscribes to a multicast address, any packets sent by that process are received by every other process that has subscribed to the multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en prosess abonnerer på multikastadresse, vil alle pakker som er sendt av at prosessen mottas med alle andre prosesser har abonnert på multikastadressen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"></xref> receives outgoing multicast packets; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"> </xref> mottar Utgående multikastingsbyte pakker; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a UDP datagram that was sent by a remote host.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en UDP-datagram som ble sendt av en ekstern vert.

trans-unit.source: The Receive method will block until a datagram arrives from a remote host.
trans-unit.target: Blokkerer Receive-metoden til et datagram kommer fra en ekstern vert.

trans-unit.source: When data is available, the Receive method will read the first enqueued datagram and return the data portion as a byte array.
trans-unit.target: Når data er tilgjengelig, leser første i kø datagram og returner datadelen som en bytematrise Receive-metoden.

trans-unit.source: This method populates the `remoteEP` parameter with the <xref:System.Net.IPAddress> and port number of the sender.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden fyller ut den `remoteEP` parameter med den <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>og portnummeret for avsenderen.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress>

trans-unit.source: If you specify a default remote host in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method, the Receive method will accept datagrams from that host only.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir en standard ekstern vert i den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>metoden Receive-metoden godtar datagram fra bare som er vert.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: All other datagrams will be discarded.
trans-unit.target: Alle andre datagram, forkastes.

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to obtain the specific error code.

trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du ønsker å motta multicasted datagram, ikke kall den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>metoden før du kaller Receive-metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sends a UDP datagram to the host at the specified remote endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Sender en UDP-datagram til verten på det angitte eksterne endepunktet.

trans-unit.source: The Send method sends datagrams to the specified endpoint and returns the number of bytes successfully sent.
trans-unit.target: Send-metoden sender datagram til det angitte sluttpunktet, og returnerer antall byte som er sendt.

trans-unit.source: Before calling this overload, you must first create an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> using the IP address and port number of the remote host to which your datagrams will be delivered.
trans-unit.target: Før du kaller opp denne overlasten, må du først opprette en <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>med IP-adresse og port. nummeret til den eksterne verten din datagram, leveres.</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: You can send datagrams to the default broadcast address, 255.255.255.255, by specifying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName?displayProperty=fullName> for the <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Address%2A> property of the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan sende datagram til standard kringkasting adresse, 255.255.255.255, ved å angi <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName?displayProperty=fullName>for <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Address%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>.</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> </xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Address%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: After you have created this <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>, pass it to the Send method as the `endPoint` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Når du har opprettet <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>, sende den til metoden Send som den `endPoint` parameteren.</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: If you want to send datagrams to any other broadcast address, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Client%2A> method to obtain the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, and set the socket option to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil sende datagram til andre kringkasting adresse, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Client%2A>metode for å hente den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, og angi alternativet socket <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Client%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also revert to using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> class.

trans-unit.source: Sends a UDP datagram to a specified port on a specified remote host.
trans-unit.target: Sender en UDP-datagram til en angitt port på en angitt ekstern vert.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method sends datagrams to the values specified by the `hostname` and `port` parameters and returns the number of bytes successfully sent.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>metoden sender datagram til verdiene som er angitt av den `hostname` og `port` parametere og returnerer antall byte sendt.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can send datagrams to the default broadcast address by specifying "255.255.255.255" for the `hostname` parameter value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan sende datagram til standard kringkasting adressen ved å angi "255.255.255.255" for den `hostname` parameterverdi.

trans-unit.source: If you want to send datagrams to any other broadcast address, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Client%2A> method to obtain the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, and set the socket option to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil sende datagram til andre kringkasting adresse, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Client%2A>metode for å hente den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, og angi alternativet socket <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Client%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also revert to using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også gå tilbake til ved hjelp av <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>klasse.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Do not provide a host name or port number to this method if you have already established a remote host with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ikke angi et vertsnavn eller portnummeret til denne metoden hvis du allerede har opprettet en ekstern vert med den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A> method will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du gjør, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>metoden vil throw <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du får en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, Bruk <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ikke hente feilkoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Når du har fått denne koden, kan du se Windows Sockets versjon 2 API feil code-dokumentasjonen i MSDN for en detaljert beskrivelse av feilen.
