trans-unit.source: Sends a UDP datagram asynchronously to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: Sender en UDP-datagram asynkront til en ekstern vert.

trans-unit.source: This overload sends datagrams to the remote host established in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne overlasten sender datagram til den eksterne verten opprettet i den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not call <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> before calling this overload, the method will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke kaller <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>før du kaller opp denne overlasten vil metoden throw <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du får en <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, Bruk <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ikke hente feilkoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: Når du har fått denne koden, kan du se Windows Sockets versjon 2 API feil code-dokumentasjonen i MSDN for en detaljert beskrivelse av feilen.

trans-unit.source: If you want to send datagrams to a different remote host, you must call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method and specify the desired remote host.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil sende datagram til en annen ekstern vert, må du kaller den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>metoden og angi den ønskede eksterne verten.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use either of the other <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.SendAsync%2A> method overloads to send datagrams to a broadcast address.
trans-unit.target: Bruk en av de andre <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.SendAsync%2A>metoden overlastingene sende datagram til en kringkasting adresse.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.SendAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Byte> that specifies the UDP datagram that you intend to send represented as an array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av typen <xref:System.Byte>som angir UDP-datagram som du har tenkt å sende representert som en bytematrise.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes in the datagram.
trans-unit.target: Antall byte i datagrammet.

trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>.

trans-unit.source: Sends a UDP datagram asynchronously to a remote host.
trans-unit.target: Sender en UDP-datagram asynkront til en ekstern vert.

trans-unit.source: This method sends datagrams to the specified endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden sender datagram til det angitte sluttpunktet.

trans-unit.source: Before calling this overload, you must first create an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> using the IP address and port number of the remote host to which your datagrams will be delivered.
trans-unit.target: Før du kaller opp denne overlasten, må du først opprette en <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>med IP-adresse og port. nummeret til den eksterne verten din datagram, leveres.</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: You can send datagrams to the default broadcast address, 255.255.255.255, by specifying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName?displayProperty=fullName> for the <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Address%2A> property of the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan sende datagram til standard kringkasting adresse, 255.255.255.255, ved å angi <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName?displayProperty=fullName>for <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Address%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>.</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> </xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Address%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: After you have created this <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>, pass it to this method as the `endPoint` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Når du har opprettet <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>, sendes til denne metoden som den `endPoint` parameteren.</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: If you want to send datagrams to any other broadcast address, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Client%2A> method to obtain the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, and set the socket option to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil sende datagram til andre kringkasting adresse, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Client%2A>metode for å hente den underliggende <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, og angi alternativet socket <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Client%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also revert to using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også gå tilbake til ved hjelp av <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>klasse.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: > [!WARNING] > Do not provide an `endPoint` parameter to this method if you have already established a remote host with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!WARNING] > Ikke angir en `endPoint` parameteren til denne metoden hvis du allerede har opprettet en ekstern vert med den <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do, this method will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du gjør, throw denne metoden <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to obtain the specific error code.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the Time to Live (TTL) value of Internet Protocol (IP) packets sent by the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir tiden Live (TTL) verdien IP (Internet Protocol)-pakker som er sendt av den <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The TTL value indicates the maximum number of routers a packet can traverse before the router discards the packet and an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) "TTL exceeded" error message is returned to the sender.
trans-unit.target: TTL-verdien angir det maksimale antallet rutere en pakke kan bla gjennom før ruteren forkastes pakken og en Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) "TTL overskredet" feilmelding returneres til avsenderen.

trans-unit.source: The TTL value.
trans-unit.target: TTL-verdien.
